page.title: 20KIDSGROVE OPEN AIR MARKET
page.content: We visited Kidsgrove market on Tuesday June 11 1985. It is held weekly and there are 20 stalls,making it quite a small market .There are 4 food stalls a sweat stall and 5 for clothes. All the stallholders go to other markets. 80% of the people who visited the market lived less than 3 miles away so most walked there. A third came by car. On the day we visited, nearly 2\3 of the people interviewed had come to buy a definite article and 61% came regularly; most to buy food. Over half of the visitors thought the market was very good but being open air when it rains there would not be as many people. The better the weather, the more customers they get. BY PHILIP POVEY, AGE 11 YEARS.
